feed.title: Snooker Blog
feed.subtitle: The snooker is an amazing game!

entry.title: BetVictor Scottish Open Draw
entry.content:
The tournament at the Glasgow Emirates runs from December 10 to 16 with 128 players battling for the Stephen Hendry Trophy.

Among the star names in the draw are Ronnie O’Sullivan, Judd Trump, Shaun Murphy, Mark Allen, Ding Junhui, home favourite John Higgins and defending champion Neil Robertson.

Tickets are available now and start at just £10 – for details click here. Take advantage of our Black Friday offer with selected tickets at just £5!
entry.summary: The tournament at the Glasgow Emirates runs from December 10 to 16 with 128 players battling for the Stephen Hendry Trophy.

entry.title: Watch snooker on Eurosport Player
entry.content:
Snooker fans throughout Europe can watch the sport anywhere and on any device on Eurosport Player, the leading live and on-demand digital sport platform.

Eurosport Player is available to download and watch in 52 markets and in 20 languages, offering fans an all-access pass to immerse themselves in the greatest events on the global sporting calendar.

With live and on-demand content available any time, fans can experience sport in the way that they enjoy best and access enhanced live features, such as additional feeds and camera angles.
entry.summary: Snooker fans throughout Europe can watch the sport anywhere and on any device on Eurosport Player, the leading live and on-demand digital sport platform.

entry.title: Trump – I Need The Big Titles

link.title: Trump – I Need The Big Titles

entry.content:
Judd Trump hopes he can keep his hot streak of form going as he looks ahead to the Betway UK Championship in York.

Trump won last week’s Northern Ireland Open in Belfast, his first ranking title in over a year. He won seven matches, culminating in a superb 9-7 defeat of Ronnie O’Sullivan in the final.
entry.summary: Judd Trump hopes he can keep his hot streak of form going as he looks ahead to the Betway UK Championship in York.
